StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [UpdateCandidateTelephone]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @PersonId int, @Type varchar(1), @AreaCode varchar(4), @Number varchar(10), @LastEditBy varchar(15) ) AS
-- This stored procedure's behavior depends upon the type of phone number being provided. -- For "Current" and "Home Of Record" phone numbers, it must only update the phone numbers. -- For all other phone numbers, which are considered to be "Addi.onal Phone Numbers", -- we must delete all addi.onal numbers to ensure that only the provided "addi.onal phone number" -- is the only one stored. IF ((@Type = 'C') OR (@Type = 'H')) BEGIN -- Is a "Current" OR "House Of Record" phone number IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [mcriss].[dbo].[CANDIDATE_TELEPHONE] WHERE [MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] = @PersonId AND [TELEPHONE_TYPE] = @Type) BEGIN UPDATE [mcriss].[dbo].[CANDIDATE_TELEPHONE] SET [AREA_CODE] = @AreaCode ,[TELEPHONE_NUMBER] = @Number ,[USER_LOGIN] = @LastEditBy ,[UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate() WHERE [MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] = @PersonId AND [TELEPHONE_TYPE] = @Type END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [mcriss].[dbo].[CANDIDATE_TELEPHONE] ([MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] ,[TELEPHONE_TYPE] ,[AREA_CODE] ,[TELEPHONE_NUMBER] ,[USER_LOGIN] ,[UPDATE_DATE] ,[rowguid]) VALUES (@PersonId ,@Type ,@AreaCode ,@Number ,@LastEditBy ,GetDate() ,NEWID()) END END ELSE BEGIN -- Is NOT a "Current" OR "House Of Record" phone number -- First, delete all numbers that are not "Current" or "Home Of Record" DELETE FROM [mcriss].[dbo].[CANDIDATE_TELEPHONE] WHERE [MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID]=@PersonId AND [TELEPHONE_TYPE] NOT IN ('C','H')
-- Finally, insert the provided number so that it is the only recorded "addi.onal phone number" INSERT INTO [mcriss].[dbo].[CANDIDATE_TELEPHONE] ([MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] ,[TELEPHONE_TYPE] ,[AREA_CODE] ,[TELEPHONE_NUMBER] ,[USER_LOGIN] ,[UPDATE_DATE] ,[rowguid]) VALUES (@PersonId ,@Type ,@AreaCode ,@Number ,@LastEditBy ,GetDate() ,NEWID()) END
